about_the_game:
Unleash Your Creativity

Step into Outside the Blocks, the ultimate playground for builders and creators who want to express their artistic side in a relaxing, stress-free environment. Forget about objectives and pressure—immerse yourself in the pure joy of creation.

Innovative Building Tools

Craft stunning, one-of-a-kind structures with our unique modular architectural block system. Whether you’re a seasoned designer or a casual creator, our intuitive tools make building a breeze:

  • Autobuild: Easily manipulate entire building sections.

  • Storytelling Props & Animated Characters: Bring your scenes to life.

  • Adjustable Materials: Customize object surfaces to fit your vision.

  • Advanced Layer System: Achieve precise control over your builds.

Dynamic Environment Tools

Take your creations to the next level with powerful tools to shape your diorama’s world:

  • Bases & Glass Domes: Frame your masterpiece in style.

  • Nature Elements & Organic Objects: Add life and vibrancy to your scenes.

  • Advanced Terrain Editing: Shape the ground to match your imagination.

  • Epoxy Resin: Easily add water levels for stunning aquatic effects.

  • Weather Conditions & Lighting Schemes: Set the perfect mood and atmosphere.

Show Off Your Masterpieces

With a built-in Photo Mode you can easily capture and share your creations with friends and the community.

Get ready to build, design, and explore your creativity like never before in Outside the Blocks—where the only limit is your imagination!
